articles.author: Joe Rossignol
articles.title: Apple TV+ Film 'CODA' Wins Best Picture at 2022 Oscars
articles.description:
Apple TV+ film "CODA" has won Best Picture at the 94th Academy Awards, becoming the first film from a streaming service to ever win the award. Academy Award for Best Picture category:
  • "Belfast"
  • "CODA" — Winner
  • "Don't Look Up"
